ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Referral')), CloseDate>DATE(2020,02,04), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Lost"), AND( MRR__c<0, ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Won"))), OR(ISPICKVAL(Loss_Category__c,""), ISPICKVAL(Primary_Loss_Reason__c,""), AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Primary_Loss_Reason__c,"Lost to Competitor")), (Loss_Reason_Detail__c=""))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 'Loss Category', 'Primary Loss Reason' & 'Loss Reason Detail' must be entered once opportunity is Closed Lost or MRR is less than 0.
